title: Council Directive 91/466/EEC of 22 July 1991 amending Directive 85/350/EEC concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Ireland)
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE of 22 July 1991 amending Directive 85/350/EEC  concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive  75/268/EEC (Ireland) (91/466/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas of Ireland as set out in the Annex to Directive 85/350/EEC is  hereby amended in accordance with the lists set out in Annexes I and II to this Directive.
This Directive is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 July 1991.
For the CouncilThe PresidentP. DANKERT
